subject: p13921768
Findings: Postoperative mediastinum with median sternotomy wires in place and multiple surgical clips. Heart size is normal. Diffuse right greater than left opacities have progressed compared to prior study in the background of emphysema. No large pleural effusion or pneumothorax.
Impression: Diffuse right greater than left pulmonary opacities likely representing pulmonary edema in the background of severe emphysema.
